channel.title: How to increase the amount of items I can buy at one time to 100 [317, PI]
channel.description:
My shops currently have a buy 1, buy 5, and buy 10 feature, but I would also like a buy 100 feature. How would I add this? I have no class9.java file
I don't mind getting rid of one option to replace it with buy 100.
